 URL : "https://github.com/diverted247/txtjs/issues/27" TITLE : container not defined BODY : hi, today i faced an issue with the txtjs npm, i am using the vue-cli and webpack and in my main.js file i have this import. require 'txtjs/dist/txt' ; i am trying to create a shape so i am using the new txtjs.text and adding some parameters stage.addchild new txtjs.text { text: 'john doe smith', font: 'cantarell', lineheight: 20, width: 1000, height: 1000, align: txtjs.align.top_left, size: 20, x: 30, y: 40, } ; but when i run the npm i got this error: txt.js?de61:631 uncaught typeerror: cannot read property 'container' of undefined at txt eval at <anonymous> app.js:920 , <anonymous>:631:16 at eval eval at <anonymous> app.js:920 , <anonymous>:633:3 at object.<anonymous> app.js:920 at __webpack_require__ app.js:660 at fn app.js:86 at eval eval at <anonymous> app.js:802 , <anonymous>:25:1 at object.<anonymous> app.js:802 at __webpack_require__ app.js:660 at fn app.js:86 at object.<anonymous> app.js:1053 txt	@	txt.js?de61:631 txt anonymous @	txt.js?de61:633. any idea? thanks
